channel.title: Help and ill pay you paypal
channel.description:
this is my compiler code: [code]@echo off start java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause[/code]
and this is the error: [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Help and ill pay you paypal
item.dc:creator: @l_skinner_l l skinner l
item.description:
@l_skinner_l wrote:

here you go sometimes you dont need to edit the java but hey it might work this should do the trick… but you do have to have jdk and java downloaded for it to work gl.

@echo off title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
j.skinner76@yahoo.com

Read full topic
item.source: Help and ill pay you paypal

item.title: Help and ill pay you paypal
item.dc:creator: @Aceron4 Aceron4
item.description:
@Aceron4 wrote:

Take this line in your compiler:

And replace the “24” with the JDK version you have. And if that doesnt work. Then try placing (x86) after Program Files.

Read full topic

item.title: Help and ill pay you paypal
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

[quote=“x1 att ftw x, post:2, topic:389493”]LOL! thats a run client code… Replace this in your NotePad

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" *.java @echo Compiler Done! pause

if not jdk 24 then change it…[/quote]

Now it says: The system cannot find the path specified.
Compiler Done!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Help and ill pay you paypal
